system.description:
At 3rd level, the entity to which you are beholden provides a more durable and lasting blessing. Choose one of the following features:

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6co2rqjh9npjg3eb]{Pact of the Blade}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2mfiz8spijbzs6h]{Pact of the Chain}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2dp9b4a11fuxjwbc]{Pact of the Tome}
